name: Carmen McClelland
text: We were looking forward to the opening of this restaurant.  Have visited several times since and food and service has been consistently good. The atmosphere of this franchise is considerably less "mellow" compared to it's San Antonio …More

name: Aric Villarreal
text: Good place to stop for Italian food. Choose from Calzones, Sandwiches,  Salads or Build your own Pizza. Great family place too. Everyone was wearing a mask correctly and tables were sanitized after each guest.

name: Fiona Johnson
text: Pizza was great. Service was okay, had to ask for missing plates and multiple things that seemed to have been forgotten. Pizza arrived before drinks that were ordered first. They were out of a lot of beers. Many masks worn below the nose of many staff members or taken off to loudly sing happy birthday defeating the purpose.

name: Keith Winfrey
text: I love the scenery and overall comfort of this place.  The food is so good and the prices are very fair for it. If it is your first time, I recommend trying the Spinach Dip.

name: Tristen Harris
text: We ordered the Mighty Meaty, and the House Special. I believe the crust was exceptionally done and they toppings came out really well. There was a great stretch on the mozzarella. …More

name: Clinton Kolba
text: I ordered two dairy free pizzas with mushrooms and dairy free cheese, they said it would be ready in 25 minutes. Upon arrival 25 minutes later they informed me that they were out of dairy free cheese and mushrooms. Yes the Mellow MUSHROOM …More

name: Annie Armitstead
text: The pizza was fantastic! Just perfect, and with the kind of eclectic flavor combinations I like. I am looking forward to coming back to get a bite there again. …More

name: Robert Erpelding
text: Unique atmosphere, helpful staff, and very good pizza.  Definitely an above average experience.  The menu offers many options other than pizza and is sure to offer something for just about anyone.

name: Debra Olds
text: Their pizza, pretzel bites, wings, humus...I could keep naming foods. It's all delicious! You're there for the atmosphere and it's a busy place so there's a wait but the drinks are good and the food is worth it!

name: Christopher Mew
text: Nice. I don't know what happened to MMs but it seems they have closed so many so I am stoked I found one. Beer and pizza, what more could you want? And their Esperanza dressing is baller. Get the local favorite pizza with shrimp and blue cheese.

name: Kristy Smith
text: My first time at Mellow Mushroom and I loved it. Hated the wait time for the food but they were pretty busy when we got there. Our waitress was nice and the perfect amount of being attentive. The atmosphere was different but I enjoyed it. …More

name: Keeley Harding
text: Food was great and service was polite. A little slow but everything was correct

name: yesenia haro
text: I love mellow mushroom and the staff are great. I love coming here and sitting at the bar the bartenders make great drinks. We always order pizza with extra pepperoni and shaved parmesan on top its ready good. My husband loves the meat calzone.

name: Travis Armstrong
text: Maybe I've gotten the wrong thing EVERY TIME, but this place has got the blandest pizza I have ever had. The service is fantastic, the staff is always really nice, but for a pizza place, they actually make terrible pizza.

name: John Parker
text: Atmosphere was great "vintage" with a really cool sculpture out front for taking pics.  Drinks were on point and pizza was excellent.  Our waitresses I believe whitney was exceptional!

name: Eric Johnson
text: Had the Mushroom Club Hoagie and it really hot the spot. Good thing that I only ordered half because this thing came loaded! …More

name: Alfredo Brown
text: My husband and I embarrassed ourselves by how fast we ate our pizza. I'm from Chicago and we do pizza but the Mellow Mushroom was the best pizza I've ever had!!

name: IamChile
text: My last visit was a little disappointing. There was a long wait for my groups food. I think they were short staffed in the kitchen. But the waiter remained nice and the manager worked out our food for us.

name: Saskia Chateigne
text: I didn't like it. I had the steak and cheese hoagie, hot wings and a mushroom soup. Soup was way to small for $6, and overly salted. The wings tasted like it came from little Ceasars, rubbery and not so fresh. The hoagie was dry and bland...won't be returning.

name: Shadowheartglow
text: Me and my girlfriend cried tears of joy eating this pizza for the first time. No exaggeration. The service was unmatched. We were sat within seconds of arriving and treated with the upmost care and respect. They had plenty of options for …More

name: Kandace Higginbotham
text: Do not order to go if you want to eat the same day. Or eat hot food.  0 stars.

name: Nikki Wright
text:
This was my first visit and I took my time before giving this review, as I don't like leaving negative reviews.
l was not at all impressed with my meal. We ordered an appetizer of pepperoni …More

name: Cesareo D1Nonly
text: food isn't all that hype,bread was kinda hard ,came out cold and the steak taste like cheap steak that for what's in the picture but I'ma have to try the pizza's they have next time.

name: Allen Devore
text:
My first time there, the service was extremely courteous
The food was a little bit different but it was delicious. I have three meat pizza, it is it was a little different from what I was used to had thick crust, whole lot of cheese and three meats.

name: Crystal Clear
text: Wonderful atmosphere and great food.

name: Katrina Portillo
text:
Amazing pizza and scenery!
It was really clean and great service.

name: Michael Fielder
text: We ordered a shiitake pie. It was delicious ! This restaurant is very clean with a lively atmosphere. Our waitress Alexis was very nice . We'll be back for sure !

name: Linda Robbins
text: Loved this place and mushroom pizza .. today not fully cooked  soggy , hardly any mushroom. I cut in such a way that 2 pieces had nothing on it. I had half of one piece and threw it away .

name: Alicia Castro
text: I give it 2 stars because I have been there before and food and service is not bad but this last time was more uncomfortable than anything. I have called ahead of time to ask if they were pet friendly, which they consulted with management …More

name: Mike Lemell
text: Great atmosphere for the family. Really enjoyed the stuffed mushroom!

name: Veronica Bannerman
text: The burger was delicious! And hot!

name: Catherine Clark
text: Took thirty minutes to prepare a small chef salad and five chicken wings. Attitude from a server who advised they only had three people working in the kitchen.

name: whitneyann04
text: The largest medium pizzas around! The mighty meaty & funky Q chicken were DELICIOUS!!!

name: Tammy Ysassi
text: Good food and great service.

name: John Burch
text: For a first time experience I would give it 5 stars. The Spinach Artichoke dip was pretty good as well as the pizza. I got the Mighty Meaty, wife got the Holy Shiitake w/Chicken. For all the diet friendly people out there they do have …More

name: Blox Ware
text: Mellow is honestly more than just pizza. The pizza was phenomenal, but what really got my wife and I was the environment. Classic music, a bar inside and outside, and the classic decor really set this place apart from everything else in town. We will definitely go back!

name: Eric Andrus
text: Must say I do a pass this place quite a few times and never stopped. Boy have I been missing out great service great pizza I must stop here in Beaumont

name: Lonnie LeBlanc
text: Great experience the server Kyle was awesome

name: Christy Ellis
text: Pizzas were amazing and the atmosphere was great too.

name: Tif Rod
text: Ryan was a awesome waiter! Service was amazing and the food was delicious!!!

name: Traci Hester
text: 1st time visit. Nice atmosphere & set up inside. Good pizza. Toe tapping music. Just a chill place. Love the psychedelic feel of it all!!!

name: Michaeljordan Brown
text: Food was ok. Atmosphere was good. Alcoholic beverages were ok. Our server Mirenda seemed like she had an attitude from the start. I feel that a little bit more training on how to interact with customers would go a long way with her. Overall place was good.

name: Jeff Burgess
text: food and service was awesome, great people with smiling face's and great hospitality. I've eaten at the very first mellow mushroom in boone north carolina that was formed by a group of young college guy and the food here was just as good, keep up the good work guys and gals.  thank you

name: Theresa Hanson
text: Pizza is SO good! This New Yorker is always looking for a good slice and hard to find but I have found this place and It was delicious.  Sorry I waited so long to give it a try. Repeat customer for sure now

name: Austin Pruitt
text: Always very good, and super friendly!

name: Chris Bradley
text: Food was excellent, the service was very s-l-o-w. Took 55 minutes to get our pizza to our table. It was not very busy.

name: carol needham
text: Everything was great, start to finish. Melanie was the BEST waitress!!!

name: Shelly Hyde
text: Love the food and the service is excellent.

name: Max Power
text: Fun atmosphere, great pizza, lots of toppings that are fairly unusual for the area. In 2 visits I was very underwhelmed with the staff on 1, but am willing to put that down to bad luck. If you have family in town and all want pizza this is a good choice.

name: Lalo Davila
text: Too expensive, They took too long, rather eat fast food

name: Reyann Gonzales
text: Love that a location opened up in Beaumont.  I've been several times and really enjoy that you can order a pizza half and half. My favorite is the holy shitaki which is a must have of you like mushrooms. I enjoy sitting at the bar and avoiding the wait.

name: nunya biniss
text: Loud music. Overpriced, mediocre food. Looked good but the flavor wasn't really there. Server left empty plates and glasses on our table.. we had to place them behind us on the bar to have room on our table. We weren't impressed 🤷‍♀️

name: Mike Sudela
text: Food was good but it took a while for out waiter to make an appearance

name: Greg Sassine
text: Fun place different than anywhere enjoyable

name: Jason B
text: My elderly parents requested to eat at your facility to celebrate my mother's 76th birthday. They had never been to your restaurant before and was excited to go there. Social distancing guidelines are currently set to 75% which is not …More

name: Ivonne Garcia
text: Yummy food with polite staff! We could tell that pizza was fresh!

name: Rebecca Seidenberger
text: The atmosphere is entertaining at the very least, but it can be a bit overwhelming at times. The staff has always been very friendly, and the food has been incredibly delicious every time. They also have quiet a variety of menu options

name: Dane Dison
text: This is absolutely not the place you want to stop if you’re looking to have a good slice of pizza the staff is undereducated and I believe they have no clue what they’re doing it seems like a bunch of robots running around in this building. Beware friends

name: Eric Ferguson
text: Portobello Mushroom was pretty darn good. Had to wait on pizzas but Aron the manager was very nice and took care of my family.

name: Richard Tracy
text: This place is AWESOME!  It looks like a pizza place from the 70's-80's era. The food here is one of a kind I recommend the "Holy Shiitake Pie", we also ate the Funk Q Chicken, Mighty Meaty Pie. This place is super clean, the staff is very …More

name: Donald H Garrett
text: Excellent pizza and staff is always taking care of your needs.

name: Nicole Smith
text: Great service and good food. Friendly staff, quickly seated, and wonderful atmosphere. Family friendly with large variety. Make it yourself burgers and pizzas, hoagies and sandwiches. Enjoyed the spinach dip, chicken salad sandwich, a …More

name: Wanda Patterson
text: One of my girls wanted to try this place out...I'm glad we did. It was delicious.  We tried the Artichoke Spinach dip...the Pretzel bite with beer cheese sauce...the garlic cheesy bread...the Sausagefest calzone...the Davinci pie...the …More

name: Leigh Tyler
text: Great selection for everyone! Everything we have tried has been delicious. Indoor and outdoor patio seating! We enjoy sitting on the patio! Great selection of drinks from the bar!

name: greg hutchinson
text: Good food great atmosphere

name: David Kibodeaux
text: Very electrified atmosphere, fantastic food, and great craft beer selection.

name: Juan Trevino
text: The staff was great and the food fenominal. I have been to the original Mellow Mushroom in Georgia, the one in Lake Charles Louisiana,  Fayettville North Carolina and now this one twice. I have to say they always aim to impress. Check it out some time.

name: Bonnie Miller
text:
Great service and free ice cream.🍦
My sandwich was loaded with meat, so much that I couldn't get it in my mouth.!!
Tomato bisque soup had small chunks of tomato and seasoned just right.

name: Scotty Goodsell
text: Great food. Superior service

name: Patricia Barbosa

name: Al Hernandez
text: Good food, good service - will definitely go back.

name: Ryan Olson
text: Great food. Really cool atmosphere!

name: Roman's Mom
text: Excited to try this place.  Atmosphere was fun.  Pizza looked and smelled good.  Hostess nice.  Maybe because I was by myself they thought I shouldn't be waited on yet?  Sat for 10 minutes with no acknowledgement.  No drink order, nothing. …More

name: Austin Ezell
text: clean restaurant but even though it wasn't that busy it took forever for us to get a drink order don't even get me started on how long it took the food to get there

text: First time here.Pizza was delicious!Drinks were on point.Our waitress  Haley  was helpful and just what a waitress should be.We will be returning 😊

name: Siren Melody
text:
It's an okay place, the pizza is alright.

name: Alex Toledo
text: Staff was awesome and the food was amazing! The overall feeling of the restaurant was very welcoming! Definitely somewhere to go back to!

name: André Éthier - HATCH
text: too much sugar in the dough, and shall be using olive oil instead of the palm oil (wild guess). the taste would be better. Also to mention, the lighting intensity was too high , bring your shades glasses with tou for dinner.

text: It was really good. We held our Christmas Party here and the service was absolutely wonderful. The food was somewhat of a hit or miss throughout the group.

name: Rebecca J

name: Brandon Rushton
text: Good pizza and good music! Menu is a little bit lacking but their pretzel beer bites are to die for.

name: Kokonut
text: Our first time here. Erin the Manager totally awesome..and the server Destiny was super cute and had us laughing. It was an amazing experience. Will definitely come back to try more. The salads are huge and delicious as well. Thanks for the great service.

name: Angelica Zuniga
text: Waited an hour to get our food, had to ask for a refill, had to hunt down our waitress, pizza was greasy, and it had so much sause that all the toppings fell off. First time and last time here. Waist of time and Money.

name: Sarah Losolla
text: I traveled into town from Austin and really enjoyed the restaurant in general. The wait time was basically non existent when we went, the wait for the food was understandable but not extremely long since the food was being made as we …More

name: Gavin Tomlinson
text: Mellow Mushroom offers excellent pizza, good service and a unique atmosphere. Prices are a little more than most specialty pizza joints but the difference is obvious when you receive your order and realize all ingredients are fresh.

name: Daniel Andrus
text: I have to give this a 2 star simply because of the wait. The food was good. The wait staff was friendly and attentive. The atmosphere was cool. The HOUR it took to get our pizza was completely unacceptable. We weren't a large party either. …More

name: Bridget
text: Great food!  Salads are pretty and delicious with quality ingredients.  Pizzas are good too.

name: Brittany Mendoza
text: The first experience I had with this place, the food was horrible and the service wasn’t that great. The pizza was bland and not made very well. I wouldn’t return just for that. Nothing I had blew me away or impressed me. …More

name: Tyler Lawson
text: Service was good. Pricing was fair. Food was good, but there are better options for pizza locally.

name: Xandria Rose
text: Unique and really tasty food! My boyfriend and I went in April, and it was a beautiful day so we sat outside. The layout and architecture is reminiscent of something that would belong in Galveston. Unfortunately, it’s too hot here to do …More

name: Ryan O.
text: This place is nice and on the nicer side of town. Staff is friendly and the beer is cold. Their pizzas are all kind of unique and tasty. Fun atmosphere, clean, located near tons of shopping.

name: K Brumley
text: Had a great experience at the Beaumont location. I had a special request due to a health issue and the staff and manager went above and beyond to accommodate my request. The food was excellent, as well. Will certainly be back.

Ah, the mellow mushroom. 🍄

name: Juan Gama
text: Great pizzas and staff. Waiter answered all of our questions.

name: Patrick Stewart
text: Really fun place. Nice staff. Great pizza. Good place to sit on the patio, visit with friends and watch the game.

name: Christina Ellis
text: The food is always top notch and never lacks in quality or taste. The service is on point and friendly. We are never disappointed here and can always expect delicious food!!

name: Thistle Waggoner
text: we had a wonderful lunch at the mellow mushroom the waitress was able to make changes to menu items to suit my dental issue they had cool music playing it was easy to park and our waitress Gracie was as sweet andaccomodating as could possibly be. we couldn't eat all because the portions were so big and we had a wonderful time

name: Aarynn Davis
text: We had Connie as our server and always, she made sure our dining experience was a great one! Make sure you ask for the new GM Chris, he's one of the friendliest GMs out there. Thanks for being awesome Mellow!

text: Delicious and love the atmosphere

name: S. Hurst
text: First time going. Would go again. I like that you can get just the right size for 2 people and not have to worry about a lot of left overs if you have no place to bring them to.

name: D Jenkins
text: Good service. The pizza tastes like it's not cooked thoroughly.

name: Brittany Ducote

name: Travis Coplen
text: Service and food were good as always!

name: Maximillian Roemer
text: I walked in the door way more thrilled than I walked out. In short, this is a pizza joint. The remainder of the menu was weak. Atmosphere was great and I highly applaud them on nailing that. It was very lively. I liked my tall booth.. pub style.

text: I got the house special pizza. It was delicious. The service was excellent. I went for lunch and was in and out. I'll definitely be back.

name: Carlos Garcia
text: We love pizza and plenty of other things but you can get that to burgers fries all kinds of drinks beers. Great atmosphere great management each mellow mushroom has its own decor. My wife has been to the one in North Carolina she really love that one too. And there are plans for more to come to Mid County area, enjoy!

name: Jessica Self
text: The food here is sure to please any picky eater. The mushroom soup is very good and the mellow mushroom pizza is garlicky goodness. This place can have a fairly long wait depending on the day and time, but it really is worth it. The restaurant is clean and has a funky 50's vibe.

name: Brandy Ramour
text: This was our first vist. The atmosphere was good the food was fresh and very good. Our waitress was very nice and attentive I wish I could remember her name. Will definitely give mellow mushroom another visit.

name: Stevie Beard
text: The food is absolutely delicious. They have a neat and fun atmosphere. I also love that they have an allergen menu online-makes it easy to see what I can and cannot eat. Very friendly staff. The music is a little too loud and there may be long wait times-but we keep coming back for more...it’s good!

text:
Great food! Great Service! Great atmosphere! Being the first week, opening it was a little crazy. However, the customer service was amazing! Pizza was great tasting, perfect temperature, and brought to table in the amount of time promised!
